CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Using P1 as electron donor and solution - processable fullerene derivative PC61BM as electron acceptor , we fabricated bulk heterojunction OPV devices with a structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / P1 : PC61BM ( 1 : 1 , w / w ) / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: PEDOT:PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. P1: Unknown material name, needs further identification
4. PC61BM: Fullerene derivative, [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Using P1 as electron donor and solution - processable fullerene derivative PC61BM as electron acceptor , we fabricated bulk heterojunction OPV devices with a structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / P1 : PC61BM ( 1 : 1 , w / w ) / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: PEDOT:PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. P1: Unknown electron donor
4. PC61BM: Fullerene derivative, specifically [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester
5. 1 : 1 : Ratio of P1 and PC61BM in the bulk heterojunction
6. w / w : Weight to weight ratio of P1 and PC61BM in the bulk heterojunction
7. Al: Aluminum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. P1: Unknown electron donor material
2. PC61BM: Fullerene derivative material (electron acceptor)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be considered as material properties. The other entities mentioned in the paragraph are either ratios or processing steps used in the fabrication of the organic photovoltaic (OPV) devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Using P1 as electron donor and solution - processable fullerene derivative PC61BM as electron acceptor , we fabricated bulk heterojunction OPV devices with a structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / P1 : PC61BM ( 1 : 1 , w / w ) / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - a conductive material used as an electrode in organic photovoltaic (OPV) devices.
2. PEDOT: Phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester: a conducting polymer used as a hole transport layer in OPV devices.
3. PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):styrene sulfonate - a conducting polymer used as a hole transport and hole-blocking layer in OPV devices.
4. P1: An electron donor material in the bulk heterojunction OPV device.
5. PC61BM: [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester: an electron acceptor material in the bulk heterojunction OPV device.
6. 1 : 1 : A ratio of the weight of P1 to the weight of PC61BM in the bulk heterojunction layer.
7. w / w : A weight-to-weight ratio of P1 to PC61BM in the bulk heterojunction layer.
8. Al: Aluminum - a metal used as a back contact electrode in OPV devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. P1: An electron donor material in the bulk heterojunction OPV device.
2. PC61BM: [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester: an electron acceptor material in the bulk heterojunction OPV device.
3. 1 : A ratio of the weight of P1 to the weight of PC61BM in the bulk heterojunction layer.
4. w / w : A weight-to-weight ratio of P1 to PC61BM in the bulk heterojunction layer.

These entities represent the properties of the materials used in the fabrication of the OPV devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| P1: An electron donor material in the bulk heterojunction OPV device |
| PC61BM: [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester: an electron acceptor material in the bulk heterojunction OPV device |
| 1 : A ratio of the weight of P1 to the weight of PC61BM in the bulk heterojunction layer |
| w / w : A weight-to-weight ratio of P1 to PC61BM in the bulk heterojunction layer |
